website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive fire ring with a touch of flair that young marshmallow roasters are sure to enjoy.
pros: Sturdy steel construction.Decorative cutouts create  ambience at night
Ideal for keeping campfires contained.28" dia
Looks great when fire is lit
cons: Rusts over time if left out in the elements
Hot coals can fall out of the cutouts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fire ring! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: We love this! It was built in about 2 minutes. I decided to build the ring outward. I used 12 retaining wall flagstones, 12 square flagstone bricks, 2 bags of river stone, and 1 bag of sand. $40 for all at Lowe's. I seriously could not be happier with how it turned out.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth V.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about buying this fire ring because it was so inexpensive, but I am so happy I did. We've used it several time this summer and it still looks new. My kids love toasting marshmallows in the evening and it makes our yard so cozy. We did buy a cover for it to protect it from the rain. I would recommend this fire ring for an easy, inexpensive diy fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Thibeault

customer_reviews.title: Works great for us!
customer_reviews.text: The price was perfect for us! We put it together with 4 of them to make it wider and higher! We have some very large fires in it. We built it 3 levels high. This is the second time with this fire pit and the other one was only 2 high and not wider like this one. The old one lasted through many HUGE fires. We love it!!! Oh and it doesn't matter to us that we burn the paint off, it gets a rusty patina, so what! It's a fire pit 😋
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Flintstone from Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic price! I bought rustoleum high heat ultra spray paint and used the whole can to do 2 coats over it to prevent rust. We had these harvest chisel stones from lowes laying around so I used 2 rows (26 stones: 12 inside 14 outside) plus 1 $3 bag of marble rock. Ended up with a gorgeous firepit for an amazing price!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice fire pit ring
customer_reviews.text: Great fire pit for a great price. It took me 5 minutes to put it together and I bought retaining wall blocks at Lowes to go around it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: 4 years, still in good shape other than some rust
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ring 4 years ago, and it has sat outside 24/7 for at least 3 of those years, even in the minnesota winter. It has worked great, and held up pretty well for the cost. It's also very light and easy to move, so it is convenient to mow around or store. The only minor complaint I have is that it is a little small, and I like big fires. It is starting to rust this year, and I think I'm going to get a bigger one, maybe a more permanent one, now that we bought a house
customer_reviews.author: Ashra

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what a $14.95 fire ring should be
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, product seems decent, bought to throw in my camper for campgrounds that don’t have rings, it’s light and should store very easy. It’s exactly what a $14.95 fire ring should be. Time will tell hownot holds up, but it was $14.95.
customer_reviews.author: Max Kent

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This fire ring is really cute when the fire is going; you can clearly see the animal cutouts. However, it's pretty flimsy, so I'm not sure how long it will last; but for the price, even if it lasts a couple years it would be worth it. Most other comparable fire rings were at least twice the price. It was very easy to put together and would be great for using with an RV as it's simple to take apart and store in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fire Ring, Even Better Price
customer_reviews.text: We are still figuring out how we want to set up our fire ring BUT 100% hands down this fire ring was a great buy. I was at Lowes today and a cheap generic ring is over 50.00???!!!! I could not believe we were able to get such a nice looking, decent sized quality item for what we paid. We're adding some lava rock to our pit tomorrow and will be using it for the first time. Great buy. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Standard St8 Kicker

customer_reviews.title: Fancy fire pit on the cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Took minutes to assemble, very sturdy. We’ve used it half a dozen times already and it has sat out exposed in nasty rainy weather and still looks good as new. Took a page out of other reviewers book and bought cheap rocks/retaining wall bricks at the hardware store to go around it. We’ve now got a fancy shmancy fire pit that cost about $60 total. Fun fact: the animal cutouts don’t repeat. Each one is unique.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: I love the designs,around it. It’s looks great especially when the fire pit is light up. And it was so easy to put the pieces together. It is very well build, good quality. I’m sure i’m going To be using this fire pit ring for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Dulce

customer_reviews.title: Great to sit around the fire with family.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 2 years ago and use it all the time. I highly recommend this fire pit. We've had roaring fires in it, roasted marshmallows over it, and had friends over sitting around a cozy fire. I've used water to put out the fire at the end of the night, plenty of times. We left it over most of the fall and winter last year and it was full of water. There's a little rust on it but we're going to paint it with high temp paint this spring. For the price, it's been a fantastic investment for feeling cozy in the backyard with family.
customer_reviews.author: Major Talm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping
customer_reviews.text: We brought it camping with us as our site didn't have a bbq or fire ring. This dismantles in 4 pieces, easy to pack and travel with. Did the jog perfectly and those little animal cutouts are perfect for added air flow and just plain cuteness. We cooked 3 meals a day for 5 days on a grill on top, worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: milka33

customer_reviews.title: Wow...better than we anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Great item and perfect price...we've enjoyed this for the past several weekend...it is overall beyond our expectations for this price...love it...held up better than expected and we've had long last hot campfires and no problems whatsoever...extremely pleased
customer_reviews.author: Julie Pieper

customer_reviews.title: Purchased and am happy that I did
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and am happy that I did. This fire ring is more sturdy than I had expected it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Best fire ring for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this for the price. Comes apart in four pieces for people that camp. Easy to put together, just 8 screws. We made ours more durable for the summer by placing rock and pavers around it and a grill on top of it. It will be easy to pack back up for winter.
customer_reviews.author: B. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the 20
customer_reviews.text: it is cute and came in 4 sections, that is it for good qualities. it is extremely thin, after one fire it turned orange and all paint burned off. if you try to move it the sections come apart, you can't return it because after one use it looks like it is 1000 years old! two of the cut out don't even look like animals after just one burn. I knew it would be cheap but this is ridiculous.DON"T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: NotJustMum

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: This was great! Bought it for weekend camping and it held up just fine! I was nervous about buying at first because people complained that their fires melted it but mine seemed ok. I don't think I would try using it as a permanent fire ring but for small camping fires it gets the job done. I also like how it comes apart for easy storage. I just put it back in its box and put it on the shelf until next time!
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fire ring!!! Great price, easy to assemble and looks cool with the animal shapes. (I'm including a pic. of my finished project, lava rock, all-purpose sand and pavers purchased inexpensively at Lowes, and 40 lbs. tempered glass purchased online from Target.) The ring takes less than 5 min. to connect the 4 pieces, and was well-packaged in a Landmann box. It arrived before the estimated date. I'm very happy with this item and it perfectly completed my project...I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: using as a collar around the christmas tree
customer_reviews.text: i do own a landmann fire pit which is the best. i bought the ring to go around my christmas tree decoratively. i do not think i would utilize this as a fire ring, unless the fires were small. the height of the ring would not be ideal, i think, for an outdoor fire ring.
customer_reviews.author: laurie k

customer_reviews.title: Better then I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical on this purchase. That wow absolutely love it . I put some black rock around the bottom. It sits on crushed gravel patio area . It will rust . I suggest spray paint it first
customer_reviews.author: Long time customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price and looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed it with fireproof paint after reading others reviews and it still looks new after several months now. It was a great price and works as described.
customer_reviews.author: Wherethe2riversmeet

customer_reviews.title: Great Fire Ring
customer_reviews.text: This ring has lasted us for 5 years. We love it. It really makes a nice fire and gives the fire just enough air to make it warm and cozy. My husband just ran over it with the lawn mower. He was hoping I could find another one just like it. I found it on Amazon at a cheaper price! The ring will rust thru snowy winters. But stays strong and intact. We just spray painted it black every couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Patti King

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with it, is thin but at that price, and I’m sure I’ll get my money’s worth. I was impressed that for the price there’s so much variety in the fit outs. Perfect for my house in the desert where is safe to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super cheap material, flimsy. It rusted all the way through after one season. But it's about the lowest price fire ring you can find so I guess it's ok for something disposable.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Simple and basic but looks really nice with a fire
customer_reviews.text: Simple and basic but looks really nice with a fire. Not the most durable looking or feeling and I wouldn't leave it out for a snowy winter but seems fine enough for occasional campfires
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy H

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great!! Took advice from others & used some bricks & crushed marble to spruce it up. Can’t wait to use with friends!!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Rusted out after less than one season
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our rental property in northern Michigan but it rusted out very quickly in less than a year. We can still use it but it is in bad shape
customer_reviews.author: Mgidd

customer_reviews.title: Love this Fire Ring!
customer_reviews.text: This fire ring was super affordable and even better our boys love animals so they really enjoy the cool cutouts in the metal. Shipping and packaging was great and the assembly was super easy, would definitely recommend for those who are looking for a great inexpensive fire ring.
customer_reviews.author: 4theloveofmusic

customer_reviews.title: I love this little fire ring
customer_reviews.text: I love this little fire ring. It is great if you have a small yard like I do. I read a ton of reviews before I ordered this. Some said that it was flimsy but if you are not moving it often it is fine. The only thing that keeps me from giving it 5 stars is that the cutouts are large enough for coals to fall out of them. I would still buy one again.
customer_reviews.author: gjhft

customer_reviews.title: Loved This
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this in my yard! Seller did a great job regarding shipping and ease of the entire purchase!
customer_reviews.author: An Amazing Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great item for the price. Had a nice fire in it the first night. Easy to assemble, light didn't appear to warp or have the coating peal from the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Liebert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to buy this because of the price. I thought it could not possibly be that good considering it was less than $20 shipped to my door in two days. I'm glad I did. It was exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Anida

customer_reviews.title: At 28” round it’s still a nice size to build a fire in
customer_reviews.text: This firepit is a decent one, I thought it would be too small so I ordered 2. At 28” round it’s still a nice size to build a fire in.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya, South Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Fits all my wood
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived ahead of schedule and was super quick to set up. Just pay attention to the flanges and make sure the upper edges line up appropriately. Trust me, it super easy, just take 30 seconds instead of 6. I had a fire rolling within a half hour of putting it together and all of my wood easily fit into the 28 inch diameter. It was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a back yard campfire
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we were looking for. It's not super heavy duty, doesn't weigh much at all and is very easy to pick up and move around. It keeps a good sized campfire well contained. Very cute cutouts!
customer_reviews.author: A. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier than price makes you think
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait for rainy season. Put it all together in an hour or so. Prep time 1 hour. Shopping for sand , gravel, bricks.1.hour . Wonderful
customer_reviews.author: H2O Liquid Assets

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and inexpensive. We used it finally and it did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Papa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was look to add to my back yard. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Assembled in under 3 minutes, such a cute fire ring!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: to be able to enjoy it and start using
customer_reviews.text: we enjoyed the firepit ring alot we love so much having a bonfire its so relaxing and we have our friends over to enjoy
customer_reviews.author: arthur prowant

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: looks nice need to fix up the rocks up a little. Can't wait fort it to cool down to have a 🔥
customer_reviews.author: MiKeY

customer_reviews.title: these burn up like tin foil on a grill
customer_reviews.text: these burn up like tin foil on a grill. after burning a bunch of boxes, like 10 min. max, to keep them out of landfills, this thing was thin and distorted.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, very sturdy. Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I love this fire ring! Fast delivery and super easy to put it together. I’m VERY happy with this purchase! I bought it just for a camping trip but I love it so much that I’m definitely taking it home for the backyard. It’s plenty big for a normal campfire, so unless you’re burning brush or something- this is a good size for the backyard, or in my case a camp site.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Asher

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren love the animals.......:) I've bought several more as gifts..........It's well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: JoyceFL50

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly, great price.
customer_reviews.text: We built a ring of landscape bricks, set this inside, then filled e cavity between this ring and the bricks with clay and dirt. The bricks seem beautifully protected, the fire/cooking area is well-defined and easy to clean out with a spade, and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. E. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to use it.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t wait to use this in a few weekends.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Great design.
customer_reviews.text: Great design... has lasted 7 months before showing any signs of rust, which is expected considering I leave it outside in my yard, exposed to the elements year round.
customer_reviews.author: GaVaHokie

customer_reviews.title: Great for campfires
customer_reviews.text: The RV park I was at for a month didn't have fire rings but you could add one. This worked great with a few added bricks from Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: Great price. You will need a fire ring if you camp in a public park and one is not provided. This keeps everything safe. It is semi-portable in that you can de-assemble and put it back in the box. This is a big plus on top of the value price tag. Bring a zip lock to store the screws later and a multi-purpose hand tool to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Sue M.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It was inexpensive. Wanted something I could use for a little campfire in our back yard. Read the reviews and realized that it would probably rust, that it would not last long, but got it anyway. Bolted together easily and was put out in my yard. It has been a few months, used it 3 or 4 times, and it is rusting, but still serves its purpose. I am guessing I will use it next summer, with the rust and then look for a replacement. For the price, I didn't expect something that would last for years and years, so was just as I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: R. Vodra

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!! Can’t wait for summer. 😍
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, sturdy, beautiful design, perfect for summer bonfires!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Cool , kids and I made a base of square blocks ... set this on top and now we have a awesome fire pit
customer_reviews.author: hunnhubb

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for having a small fire in a small yard.
customer_reviews.author: Cody L. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, perfect for what we were needing in our backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great size for RV.
customer_reviews.text: Well-made and attractive. Just the right size-- easy to store in our RV. Lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy McCann

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for the price * no weathering issues * portable ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT for the price * no weathering issues * portable * squirrels love to play in it when not in use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived damaged and broken. Left out in a rain storm by u p s box torn and soaked.
customer_reviews.author: Shane P

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my fire pit. Well made, isn't rusting in the rain and is just the right size. Highly recommend it. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Black

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous details
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful and sturdy fire ring. We got it for Sukkot and love it. It's so easy to assemble as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Fire Ring
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Does come with small screws so it you are setting it up at night beware!
customer_reviews.author: LISA J.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT purchase! Light weight so we can move it easily depending on the wind. Has held up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: LisaB

customer_reviews.title: Too thin/rusts quickly
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but rusts immediately. After 1 year it's heavily rusted and large chunks fall off. Won't survive past 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: J. T.

customer_reviews.title: Thin/Light but will work for what I need.
customer_reviews.text: As others have said it is a bit on the light/thin side. On a positive note that makes it easy to move on the negative it will probably not last too long. I currently have an older heavier one that is at least 11 years old and going strong. It will serve the purpose though.
customer_reviews.author: ICONMAKER

customer_reviews.title: Cute and I really like the animal cut outs on the fire pit
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of the animals on the fire pit. We use these to decorate tables for promoting and marketing our campground.
customer_reviews.author: L. Pinkham

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Its great for nice picnics at night even better, very pleased
customer_reviews.author: BEAR

customer_reviews.title: Bargain Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for under $20 dollars. Added a few stone edging stones and it will be ready to use for New Years.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great product and was easy to put together. It was also very sturdy. I was super surprised at how nice it was because it only cost $20 . In this case you got more bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Back to Nature
customer_reviews.text: We love our fire ring. We actually ordered two. We enjoy sitting by the fire and seeing all the cut outs of the animals. The product is great for money. One word of warning. The ring will crush if pressure is applied while you have a fire in it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: We used it camping last weekend in an area with no facilities and it was great
customer_reviews.author: Erika Tindel

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: I used it to build a fire pit. Hasn't rusted as of yet and I don't cover it.
customer_reviews.author: Choco_Latte-

customer_reviews.title: Very cute; works outside of it's intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: The grate on our cheapo rolling fire pit rusted away. With a little modification (I added a couple of angle brackets for stability), this ring replaced it perfectly.....saved us $40 because we didn't need to get a whole new pit. The black finish burns off right away but it still looks good,
customer_reviews.author: mkegaffer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and it made for the perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Works great and it made for the perfect gift. Thank you for having this item at a decent price compared to other markets that had it at a higher price.
customer_reviews.author: Movieman

customer_reviews.title: Just What We Needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to use as a fire pit. Bought this in the Spring 2018 and use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, good quality for price, works really well.
customer_reviews.author: angellica holt

customer_reviews.title: Great look for an exceptional price!
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used it yet but it is nice looking. We put it together with no trouble—easy peasy. Since some people complained of rust, we are going to hang it in our garden shed when we aren't using it.
customer_reviews.author: S. S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great little fire ring. We bought it last summer and used it all the time. Over the winter, I moved the ring out of the snow and I just put it back out for this season. It is like new still. It is sturdy and holds the fire nicely.
customer_reviews.author: nick d.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third fire so far and I love it, and the price what ! You can’t beat that for how much fun you are going to have with this..
customer_reviews.author: Richard seabidge

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a fire ring for where we went camping. We were so happy, easy to assemble, it's amazingly eye catching, and keeps your wood in a centered place. At the price, you won't find something better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I've used mine a few times. experience with these fire rings products at friend's houses lead me to believe it will hold up ok for at least a few years. Of course, these are thin and are not designed to be used for extremely hot fires.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Plus I added wingnuts so I could take it apart easily to store in my camper
customer_reviews.text: Held the fire inside. Plus I added wingnuts so I could take it apart easily to store in my camper. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jhop13

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Really good looking fire ring. Went together in less than 5 minutes. The quality is very good for the price. We enjoy the look of the animal cutouts with the fire dancing behind it. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DeplorableMe

customer_reviews.title: metal is a little flimsy and the black wears off ...
customer_reviews.text: metal is a little flimsy and the black wears off really quickly with heat. Started to rust within few fires.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hafermann

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: I like it! It arrived late thank to 4th of July but all good. Decent quality metal good size.
customer_reviews.author: Toasthax

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product, have been using almost a year and has held up rather nicely, kinda surprised for the price
customer_reviews.author: Todd Rensel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Very easy to put together. Durable. Fast delivery. A+ transaction., Highly recommend. I bought two of them.
customer_reviews.author: CAW

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: I really like it little made on cheap side but looks good for price and small fire
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and the perfect size. Lightweight and great for back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley A

customer_reviews.title: Good for the casual fire
customer_reviews.text: Good fire ring, it'll need painted after a while but serves the purpose well
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Good but for the price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect size for my fire pit🔥 Thought I would want or need larger but this was fine. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: flimsy fire ring
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice looking fire ring, but very flimsy. Don't leave it out in the rain, it will rust. I bought it to use this year until I dig a real fire pit next year. It should last long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P. Hangey

customer_reviews.title: disposable fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the price but you will only get one season out of it. We have fires about once or twice a week and have had it about 6 week's and it is now a grayish white instead of Brown and will not come clean.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a smaller fire ring, perfect size for our pit. It's so cute and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQMax

customer_reviews.title: Too cool.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have done a better job for the price. Nests perfect in my camp gear box.
customer_reviews.author: John T

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It's as cute as I thought it would be. Used it several times holding up great
customer_reviews.author: ChadBBrewn

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: A little thinner metal than I expected, but still nice. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the hunting trips we went on this year
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Family loves it
customer_reviews.text: I looked at lot of fire rings before buying this and it is a great deal for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fire ring at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: So glad we go this for our fire pit. Durable and very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: honestshopper123

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Fire ring. I bought two...one for me and one for my neighbor.

product_meta.title: Landmann 28312 28-Inch Big Sky Steel Fire Ring, Black
